page.title: 08Markets
page.content: Cattle Market: Llanrwst has a well known cattle market with frequent sales. There is always a market on the Wednesday which succeeds the first Tuesday in the month and this is known as Fair Day.The markets are well attended by farmers from both within the immediate area and others from further afield.On the Fair Day, or otherwise on Tuesdays weekly,a market is held in Ancaster Square,consisting of about 12 stalls,sometimes more in the summer or before Christmas. These offer carpets, household linen, china, clothing, leather goods, plants and garden produce, soft furnishing, haberdashery, fruit and vegetables, and seasonal items. The market is well attended and buses bring in customers from outlying areas.
